comment: Smart Dta Models - FareCollectionSystem adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Transportation/master/FareCollectionSystem/schema.json
description: A public transit fare collection system Data Model

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: cardId
contents.comment: Unique ticket Id of the transaction or Id of the smart card used in the transaction.

contents.name: currentTripCount
contents.comment: The current count of trips made by the vehicle corresponding to this observation on the given day of operation.

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: destinationStopCategory
contents.comment: Type of the destination bus stop corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: destinationStopId
contents.comment: Unique Id of the bus stop at which the passenger deboards from the bus corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: destinationStopName
contents.comment: The name of the destination bus stop corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: direction_id
contents.comment: Indicates the direction of travel of the vehicle corresponding to this observation, can be referenced from the GTFS static feed trips.txt. SameAs: 'direction_id' field from GTFS Realtime message-TripDescriptor (https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs-realtime/reference#message-tripdescriptor)

contents.name: entryAreaCode
contents.comment: Area code of the passenger boarding stop (used by the fare collection agency). For example, whether the stop is city-bus-service stop or brts stop or other service type stop etc.

contents.name: equipmentCompanyCode
contents.comment: Company/Agency code for the transaction equipment (used by fare collection agency). For example, 103 - CBS (city bus service),102 - BRTS etc.

contents.name: equipmentId
contents.comment: Unique Id of the equipment corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: equipmentSequenceNumber
contents.comment: Sequence number for the given equipment.

contents.name: equipmentStopId
contents.comment: Stop Id (BRTS) at which the equipment corresponding to this transaction is installed.

contents.name: equipmentType
contents.comment: Type of equipment or the name of the equipment corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: exitAreaCode
contents.comment: Area code of the passenger alighting stop (used by the fare collection agency). For example, whether the stop is city-bus-service stop or BRTS stop or other service type stop etc.

contents.name: fareForAdult
contents.comment: The fare for an adult in the journey corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: fareForChild
contents.comment: The fare for a child in the journey corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: observationDateTime
contents.comment: Last reported time of observation.

contents.name: originDestinationCode
contents.comment: The code for the origin and destination stops corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: originStopCategory
contents.comment: Type of the origin bus stop corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: originStopId
contents.comment: Unique Id of the bus stop at which the passenger boards into the bus corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: originStopName
contents.comment: The name of the origin bus stop corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: passengerCount
contents.comment: Number of passengers travelling in the public transit bus corresponding to this observation. This count is computed based on the realtime ticketing transactions in the public transit bus.

contents.name: route_id
contents.comment: Route Id assigned to the route on which the bus/vehicle corresponding to the bus in this observation is currently plying on. SameAs: 'route_id' field from GTFS Realtime message-TripDescriptor (https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs-realtime/reference#message-tripdescriptor)

contents.name: shiftOfOperation
contents.comment: Shift of operation of the public transit vehicle operated by the fare collection agency/ public transit agency or the employee corresponding to this observation. Indicated as '1' when the vehicle operates in the first shift, '2' when the vehicle operates in the second shift and '3' when the vehicle operates in the third shift.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: stage
contents.comment: Total number of stages from the origin bus stop to the destination bus stop.

contents.name: ticketTypeCode
contents.comment: Unique ticket type code of the corresponding trip.

contents.name: transactionDateTime
contents.comment: Date-time of the transaction corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: transactionType
contents.comment: Type of the transaction corresponding to this observation. For Eg - Issue, ReIssue, Entry, Exit etc.

contents.name: transactionTypeDescription
contents.comment: Description of the transaction type. Explanation of various transactionTypeId codes used in the data.

contents.name: transactionVehicleNum
contents.comment: Code used by fare collection agency for the vehicle number corresponding to the transaction.

contents.name: travelDistance
contents.comment: The distance between the origin bus stop and the destination bus stop corresponding to this observation.

contents.name: trip_id
contents.comment: Trip Id/Trip name alloted to the bus corresponding to this observation, in consideration to the time of the day and the direction of the trip on the given routeId. SameAs: 'trip_id' field from GTFS Realtime message-TripDescriptor (https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs-realtime/reference#message-tripdescriptor)

contents.name: vehicle_label
contents.comment: User visible label, i.e., something that must be shown to the passenger to help identify the correct vehicle. SameAs: 'label' field from GTFS Realtime message-VehicleDescriptor (https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs-realtime/reference#message-vehicledescriptor)

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
